snippet: The party designated Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, to run against Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
abstract: Westchester County executive Rob Astorino accepts Republican Party's designation to run for New York State governor and paints bleak picture of Gov Andrew M Cuomo's tenure as marked by economic doldrums, stifling taxes and lack of political courage.
lead_paragraph: The party designated Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, to run against Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: Astorino, at G.O.P. Convention, Vows ‘Fight to Save New York’
headline.print_headline: Astorino, at Convention, Vows ‘Fight to Save New York’
